S

search(Point2D[]) - Method in class robot.FlagFinder
The search method will have the robot find and examine all of the blocks inside the enemy's base camp until it finds the block with the correct color, the flag.
setDetectionInfo(boolean[], boolean[]) - Method in class robot.Navigator
Allows outside classes to set the boolean values of whether there is an object in front of the robot, whether the object is within D cm and whether the object's color was seen.
setPart(int) - Method in class robot.Display
Method that sets what part of the game the robot is in, so that it can display the relevant information.
setPosition(double[], boolean[]) - Method in class robot.Odometer
Sets the position of the robot as requested by the update array of booleans.
setWidth(double) - Method in class robot.Odometer
This method allows the user to set the value representing the width of the wheelbase
squareTravel(double, double, Point2D[]) - Method in class robot.Navigator
This method will make the robot go from its current point to the destination point travelling entirely along lines parallel to the x and y axis.
start() - Method in class robot.Odometer
Function to stop the timerlistener
stop() - Method in class robot.Odometer
Function to start the timerlistener
stopMotors() - Method in class robot.Navigator
Stops the motors
